div.a: School Closure Update & Senior Parent Survey

p.b: Upon the recommendation of Governor Andy Beshear, Cloverport Schools will remain closed to in-person classes through the remainder of the school year. We will work through NTI Day #32, which will make the last day for students Wednesday, May 6th. All other school activities are cancelled until further notice as well. We appreciate everyoneâs patience and hard work during this unprecedented time.
We ask that the parents of seniors complete this survey regarding graduation ASAP.
